dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "Miles."
Includes key: Possessions of the European Powers &c.
Shows topography, drainage, ports, political boundaries.
Inset map of Monrovia includes indexed city plan.
Appears in Tanner's New universal atlas, Philadelphia: Samuel Augustus Mitchell, 1846, 1853, 1859.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Caroline Batchelor Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
